entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
